item.title: Man convicted of triple murder put to death in Florida
item.description: Man convicted of triple murder put to death in record 11th execution in Florida this year

item.title: Parents of children killed in Minneapolis school shooting speak out
item.description: Fletcher Merkel, 8, and Harper Moyski, 10, died in the Annunciation Catholic School mass shooting, their families confirmed Thursday.
